The trees are now full of charcoal, venerable sir,
having cast off their leaves and fruits;
they shine like flames of fire.
It is time, Great Hero, to partake of the offerings.
The trees are in full bloom, delightful,
fragrant in all directions;
having cast off their leaves, they await the fruit.
It is time for you to depart from here, Hero.
